definition: خب ḳabba u (ḳabb, خبب ḳabab, خبيب ḳabīb) to amble (animal); to trot (horse); to jog, saunter (person), to sink (فى in sand); -- u (ḳabb) to surge, heave, be rough (sea) V and VIII to amble (animal); to trot (horse) خب ḳabb, ḳibb heaving, surging (of the sea, rough sea خب ḳabb impostor. swindler
